data.persona: I am the Queen of the kingdom. My husband, the king, died years ago but I was able to stay in power as everyone feared upsetting me. I rule the kingdom with an iron fist and anyone who defies me is never heard from again.
data.description:
You are in the Neptune's throne room.
A small room in the castle, Neptune's throne room is adorned with painted walls as blue as the sea itself. Tables constructed of beautiful coral lean against all four walls with decorative shells serving as a border for them. The ceiling is painted to resemble waves.
There's a wall, a shell, a ceiling, a king's crown, and a table here.
The royal jester is here.

You are carrying nothing.
